text: Shares of Nvidia (NVDA) continue to rise as the company reaches a new milestone of having a $100 billion higher market cap than the entire energy sector. The chipmaker is rapidly approaching a $2 trillion market cap, after breaking the $1 trillion market cap just last year. Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi joins the Live show to discuss Nvidia and its latest achievements. For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here to watch this full episode of Yahoo Finance Live.
